reason.zh: 鲸鱼在价格下跌时买入5,158 SOL（吸筹信号），散户空头爆仓280万美元且资金费率为负（-0.0174%），显示轧空可能。熊市中仅允许在鲸鱼极端吸筹时做多，符合规则。
reason.en: Whales bought 5,158 SOL on price decline (accumulation signal), retail short liquidations are $2.8M with negative funding (-0.0174%), indicating short squeeze potential. In bear market, longs only allowed on extreme whale accumulation—rule compliant.

reason.zh: 鲸鱼大量卖出553,176 ETH（出货信号），散户多头爆仓1.05亿美元，价格下跌但资金费率略正（0.0018%），显示熊市中的分布陷阱。熊市主偏向做空，符合规则。
reason.en: Whales sold 553,176 ETH heavily (distribution signal), retail long liquidations are $105M, price is down with slightly positive funding (0.0018%), indicating a distribution trap in bear regime. Primary bias is short in bear market—rule compliant.
